answers.answer: I went 5 days with no food. And very minimal fluid. Went to hospital and all they gave me was an injection. If you feel like you need to be seen then go. Make sure they look after you unlike mine xx
Hi hun i was offered injectipn but said no and they gave me tablets which have worked a treat i still be sick on the odd occassion but they really do help x

From 4-8 weeks of my pregnancy I was the same way. Stayed in touch with other mommy's and they told me just to do what I can. Fruit was very easy to keep down and helped a lot with dehydration. I'm a very firm believer in only going to the hospital when it's necessary. This is a relatively normal thing. Just drink what you can even if it comes back up. They will most likely give you fluids at hospital. No real cure for morning sickness

I went in last night I have gestational diabetes so I was worried about my blood sugar but it was perfect they gave me a bag of fluid and some iv zofran I left feeling 100% better and starving came home hubby made me a sandwich then went to, sleep:) and a pulse we got to see our little one so cool cuse I have a sono on Christmas eve but my hubby has to work so he got to,see this one:)

question: Not even water:( how ling should I wait tell I go to the hospital I feel dehydrated:(
title: i cant keep anything down today
